convo.convoLine: Some of the receipts in this bag suggest he was spending a lot of money, which could be gambling.  But this Africa trip envelope is for a country where the fake Exceleron was dumped!
Though this Africa trip envelope...  Isn't that to one of those countries where the fake Exceleron was dumped?
Oh my goodness, they're arresting Vice President Soriano!
Or he was protecting his own ...
You know, it's the one with all the pictures of me with my baby girl.  So embarrassing!
I knew you couldn't be trusted.
How else would he have known to come here if Terry didn't tell him?
But you don't need the flash drive, do you Chris?
I mean, you've found Terry, haven't you?
The fake Exceleron was dumped in that African country.  Wow!  Could it be he's trying to frame his own sister?
And while you're at it, you can see if he has a gambling problem.
Are you getting arrested?!
Oh look, there's Chris.
So, is Chris involved in gambling?
Is that Terry?
Oh my goodness... Chris will think I did that!  Please, put everything back together.
Here comes Chris, look natural.
I'll make sure Chris doesn't see.
Oh, false alarm! I thought it was Terry's flash drive, but it was just one of mine.
Oh my goodness!
Seems like he spent a lot of money.
Can you believe they charge $15 to valet your car here?
What the ...?
What do you think?
What's going on?
What's going on?
So Chris, you know where Terry is?
What makes you say that?
Chris must have been working with Vice President Soriano!
Does Chris have a gambling problem?
